    • Method Detail

      • onActionAddAssociatedPart

        void onActionAddAssociatedPart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Adds an associated part to the current product. For next version add in Quantity functionality. Possibly remove from Inv as well. Fixed addAssociatedPart with for loop so associated part goes to the correct product and gets added to the Observable List.
        Parameters:
        event - Mouse click event

      • onActionRemoveAssociatedPart

        void onActionRemoveAssociatedPart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Removes the chosen associated part.
        Parameters:
        event - Mouse click event

      • onActionSaveProduct

        void onActionSaveProduct​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        On mouse click saves modifications. Separated Product data from part data so Java could process and correctly add parts.
        Parameters:
        event - mouse click event.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case main screen isn't found.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - for scene.wait method.

      • onActionCancel

        void onActionCancel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Cancels modifications to product.
        Parameters:
        event - mouse click event.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case main screen isn't found.

      • searchPartId

        public Part searchPartId​(int id)
        Code base for part ID search function.
        Parameters:
        id - part id that you are searching for.
        Returns:
        Return part you are searching for.

      • searchPartName

        public void searchPartName​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Allows user to search for specific parts.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - keyboard action event on press "Enter."

      • sendProduct

        public void sendProduct​(Product product)
        Retrieves product for modification. Had issues with product associated parts clearing after pressing save. Made a clone of the associated part list so it is more usable and doesn't wipe associated parts.
        Parameters:
        product - Product to modify
